greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} 1/(1-x^k)^(k*(k-1)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: Clear[a]; a[n_]:= a[n] = 1/n*Sum[(DivisorSigma[3, k]-DivisorSigma[2, k])*a[n-k], {k, 1, n}]; a[0] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 11 2016, following a suggestion of _George Beck_ *)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 27 2015
